questions.text: Hello, I'm the spanish teacher. We're going to learn some spanish today!
Por supuesto. Me voy a ir yendo ya entonces. ¡Hasta pronto!
What do you want to learn today? ¿Qué quieres aprender hoy?

The proverb "Estas hecho un roble" literally means "You're like an oak". 
It is used to tell somebody that he is really healthy
When something is really easy we say "Es pan comido"
When somebody goes reeeeally slowly we tell him "¡Vas como una tortuga!"
¿En que pais dicen "laburo" para referirse al trabajo?

answers.text: Nice to meet you! I'm eager to learn
It was a pleasure! Digo... ¡Ha sido un placer!
Me he cansado de aprender, ¿podemos parar ya?
